meanings.definition: The quality or state of being cooperative.
meanings.sent1: Her cooperativeness in the group project helped everyone succeed.
meanings.sent2: The success of the team was due to their cooperativeness.
meanings.sent3: The cooperativeness of the puzzle pieces made completing it a breeze.
meanings.sent4: In a garden, the flowers and bees show perfect cooperativeness.
meanings.sent5: The cooperativeness of the ants carrying food amazed the onlookers.

meanings.definition: Willingness to work together towards a common goal.
meanings.sent1: The cooperativeness of the community made the charity event a success.
meanings.sent2: Team sports require a high level of cooperativeness among players.
meanings.sent3: The cooperativeness of the ingredients in the recipe resulted in a delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: The cooperativeness of the gears in the clock kept perfect time.
meanings.sent5: The cooperativeness of the waves helped the surfers catch the perfect ride.
